sentences.english: The patient individualizes commonly blemish, psychogenic disorder duration is in less than of half an year.
sentences.chinese: 病人一般有個性缺陷，心理障礙持續時間在半年以內。

sentences.english: Implementing customer scenarios to include the flow of defect submissions expands integration coverage.
sentences.chinese: 包含缺陷交付流程的實施客戶場景擴展了集成的範圍。

sentences.english: He also insinuates that the oral tradition from which the Gospels originated was flawed.
sentences.chinese: 他還暗示，福音書因爲口口相傳是有缺陷的。

sentences.english: The prevalence rates increased with increasing gravidity or parity.
sentences.chinese: 出生缺陷發生率隨着孕產次的增加而明顯提高。

sentences.english: They (China) are mistakenly trying to impose a flawed Monroe Doctrine in their backyard.
sentences.chinese: 中國錯誤的想在自己的後院實施有缺陷的門羅主義。

sentences.english: With this greater intensity, there are the two major drawbacks.
sentences.chinese: 在這種光照強度下，會有兩個主要缺陷。

sentences.english: Bandy legs and fiddle front are objectionable.
sentences.chinese: 彎曲的前腿和提琴前腿都屬於缺陷。

sentences.english: SJL daub can be used to repair cement or concrete products for their outlook defects.
sentences.chinese: SJL膠泥可用於修補混凝土與水泥製品的外觀缺陷。

sentences.english: In this paper, the main defects in making PCCP(prestressed cylinder concrete pipe)and treatment for the defects are introduced.
sentences.chinese: 本文介紹了PCCP生產中的主要缺陷及處理辦法。

sentences.english: We will repair or replace free of charge any non-moving part found to be defective.
sentences.chinese: 我們會對有缺陷的非移動部件免費進行維修或更換。

sentences.english: Victorians saw a cleft palate as a defect that built character.
sentences.chinese: 維多利亞時代將齶裂視爲塑造特徵的缺陷。

sentences.english: In this paper analysis is made on the defects of present diamond dry cutting wheels.
sentences.chinese: 本文分析了目前風冷式金剛石幹切片存在的缺陷。

sentences.english: These faults make the goods quite unsalable in this market.
sentences.chinese: 這些缺陷使得產品在此地市場很難銷售。

sentences.english: Moral judgement has no place in the world of remediating disability.
sentences.chinese: 在醫治缺陷的世界裏道德判斷沒市場。

sentences.english: Reclaim system of defective vehicles is one of important systems regarding vehicle management.
sentences.chinese: 缺陷車輛回收制度是車輛管理的重要制度之一。

sentences.english: The number of defects found per person-hour was also less using the PBR technique.
sentences.chinese: 使用PBR技術的找到缺陷所需的人時也少得多。
